messages.subject: Sore throat, was For Nanci...Gardening with kids
messages.msgSnippet: ... Slippery Elm Bark - I get it in tea and drink it by the gallon. It feels wonderful going down and leaves your throat feeling much better, it s miraculous
messages.messageBody:
> From: Nanci Kuykendall <aisliin@...>
> Feels like I have broken glass in my throat
> every time I swallow. I don't want to go to the doc
> and shell out a bunch of money, so am hoping that this
> is something I can kick on my own. Any ideas folks?


Slippery Elm Bark - I get it in tea and drink it by the gallon. It feels
wonderful going down and leaves your throat feeling much better, it's
miraculous stuff!

Blue Skies!
-Robin-
Mom to Mackenzie (8/28/96) and Asa (10/5/99) who spent much energy today
drawing "wounds" on their bodies with red markers in graphic detail
http://www.geocities.com/the_clevengers Flying Clevenger Family
